Description: The flight into Egypt; the Virgin sitting on the ass holding the child; St Joseph at left leading the ass; landscape background with cherubs in the sky. Early impression (blank on verso) of an illustration first used in 'Devotissime Meditationes de vita ... Jesu Christi', Augsburg: Grimm and Wirsung, 1520. Woodcut
Bibliographic references: Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (II.162.1)
